name: MetalGreymon: Alterous Mode
effect: [When Digivolving] If a Digimon card with [MetalGreymon] in its name is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Omnimon] or [Greymon] (other than [DoruGreymon], [BurningGreymon], or [DexDoruGreymon]) in its name, it gets +2000 DP.
